name: Notion goal tracker
description: Free notion goal trackerKeep track of all the goals you want to reach with this aesthetic, green themed notion template: divide them into smaller steps to keep the focus on your objectives and to make them easier to achieve. Easy to use, even for beginners. Fully customisable. Easy access from any device. Comes with a youtube tutorial. Remember to leave a review if you want to receive a discount code for your next purchases. More templates will soon be available!What will you receive?Goal tracke
features: Goal tracker template; Colour palette; A zip file with 4 solid colour covers + the "My goals cover"
